The drunk also begins to run behind Grimlock, but then he looks up as the roof as a rock falls on him, the beam that had been flamed collapsing (if anyone has a prob with me posting damage for the tunnel, i'll repost). He jumps back, the roof collapsing in front of him.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> The missles (The drunks and Grimlocks) exploded taking a chunk out of the
> cover that Branding was hiding behind. "Holy Maker if you get me out of this
> alive I swear on all my circuits that I'll find a nice little corner of the
> universe and settle down with an automoton and have lots of little circuits
> running around." she had begun to babble when she lost Doggeds signal, "Oh
> FRAG IT." she fealt that the Cybrats had had it, there was no more time for
> teamwork or unity it was now every bot for herself. She detected a support
> beam and started launching fireballs repeatedly at it hoping to collapse the
> tunnel either on top of the Autobots or between them there wasn't time to
> care which she just didn't want to end up like poor Dogged.>
